https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xX9gmwtnTi0Y8WcTF7Jsg9Hdp6W.jpg A master thief coincidentally is robbing a house where a murder—in which the President of The United States is involved—occurs in front of his eyes. He is forced to run, while holding evidence that could convict the President. Absolute Power
